title: Anbe Peranbu Lyrics in Tamil
stanzas:
Anbe anbin
aththanaiyum neeye
kangal kaanum
karpanaiyum neeye

vaanathiyum nilathaiyum
nirappidave
oru paravai podhum
podhum
kadal sumandha
siru padage

Anbe anbin
aththanaiyum neeye
kangal kaanum
karpanaiyum neeye

kuruvi neenthum nadhiye
meengal parakkum vaaname
suttum kulirum sudare
maayamae

yaeri neeril
un mugamthaan vilugaiyile
yaendhi kolla
devathaigal vandhidume

dhisaigal tholaithaene
alaiyil midhanthene
theevai pola vandhaai
nindraai neeye

kadal sumandha
siru padage
Anbe anbin
aththanaiyum neeye
kangal kaanum
karpanaiyum neeye

kadavulin kaigalai
kandathu unnidam
mattumthaan

ennuyir boomiyil
piranthathu
pidithathu innodi
mattumthaan.

idiyum minnalum
murinthathu indru
thaniyaai maramondru
vendrathu nindru

nilavin oliyil nee
nilathin oliyil naan
pesa pesa pookkal pesuthe

oh ho.. en magale
oh ho.. en magale
oh ho.. en magale
o ho ho...
